mapper.insert: INSERT INTO passengers(user_id, passenger_name, id_card_type, id_card_no, phone, passenger_type, is_default) VALUES(#{userId}, #{passengerName}, #{idCardType}, #{idCardNo}, #{phone}, #{passengerType}, #{isDefault})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM passengers WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM passengers WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_default = 1 AND is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 1
